This is my favourite game right now and has always been. Its compelling narrative, outstanding graphics, and unique game-play is perfect in a game.
An improvement from the first one! I had to use the internet a "few" times to get it solved, but overall a good game and one of the best plot twists and endings I've ever seen in a game.

I played the single player story of Portal 2 along time ago, but recently had the chance to play through the co-op campaign - which is what this review will be focused on. The co-op experience was fun and there were some puzzles we really had to think outside the box to solve. There is also some story elements to it that I didn't expect and while they were few and far between, they added to the experience.

The Portal 2 co-op campaign took about 5 to 6 hours to complete. Once you finish "the story" there is another set of challenges to do and they proved to be some of the more difficult levels. Ultimately, I would recommend the game - even just for the co-op - especially when it often goes on sale for a dollar or two.

I have played co-op mode with my boyfriend on two PCs and we really enjoyed this game! We struggled in the extra courses after the main story, but it felt really good after we solved them. I would definitely recommend to play this game with best friends, sisters, brothers, partners who likes solving puzzles.
Its a very good game. We need portal 3.

get it, that's all i can say. it's a page in the story book of gaming that marked a new chapter for modern game design, it was games like these that we will never be able to relive. all i can say is remeber GLaDOS singing. it will be with you for ever. and you will wish you could go back to that cold feburary 14 2015 when you first picked up this game and played the first level.

even though we will never relive it, we can always experience it. i just hope portal 3 is as good or better as this game. if it ever comes.

Portal 2 is a great combination of first person shooter and puzzle game, just like its prequel. I love the clever story line and the amazing multiplayer maps. 10/10 literally my favorite game. Will recommend to anyone who will listen. Could rant about how great this game is for hours.
